introduction: PLUM Agency is a brand entertainment firm that has partnered with Mechanizedmules to deliver entertainment with artistic integrity and visual elegance. F--K was created as a promotional campaign for LAByrinth Theater Company's Celebrity Charades benefit. Mechanizedmules were careful to package it as a short film—with no mention of the event itself, the short film was highlighted at the Tribeca Film Festival where each ‘round' went viral and brought a tremendous amount of BUZZ to the event.Director: Rick Rodgers Writer: Ed Vassallo DP/Editor/Sound: Rick Rodgers Executive Producers: Yul Vazquez, Ed Vassallo, Rick Rodgers, Taso Mouhteros, Sung W. Lee.Cast (in order of appearance): Bobby Cannavale, Eric Bogosian, Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay, Sam Rockwell, Yul Vazquez, Leslie Bibb, Daphne Rubin-Vega, Bob Balaban, Luca Ariel Constanzo, Jesse L. Martin, Tomoko Miyagi.
